oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The effect of (TB-FE) thickness on the resistivity and magnetoresistance of (TB-FE)/PT multilayers
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: NIGAM, AK
ACHARYA, BR
PRASAD, S
CHANDRA, G
VENKATARAMANI, N
KRISHNAN, R
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Electrical resistivity and magnetoresistance measurements were carried out, in the temperature range of 4.2K to 300K and fields up to 45 kOe on sputtered deposited (TbFe/Pt) multilayers. The Pt layer thickness was 20 Angstrom and that of TbFe layer was varied from 50 to 206 Angstrom. The properties show a large dependence on TbFe layer thickness.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF MAGNETISM AND MAGNETIC MATERIALS,148,339-341
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: 14th International Colloquium on Magnetic Films and Surfaces (ICMFS)/International Symposium on Magnetic Ultrathin Films, Multilayers and Surfaces,DUSSELDORF, GERMANY,AUG 29-SEP 02, 1994
